SENT.plain: Carcinoma of the gallbladder in an extremely rare tumor in childhood
We have found only five cases in the literature
Most of them were associated with an ethnic group - The Navajo Indians - who are known to have high incidence of gallbladder disease
We report here on the exceptional presence of this type of tumor in a child, who also had achondroplasia
This, as far as we can determine, is the first such case ever reported
